articles.description: All the latest football news and European reaction as Rangers draw with Spurs, Rasmus Hojlund scores twice to help Man Utd win plus more.
articles.title: Man Utd come from behind to win & Rangers draw with Spurs - European reaction

articles.description: Tottenham weren't ready for what Rangers threw at them but got out of jail with their Europa League equaliser, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Rangers 1-1 Tottenham: 'Lost tourists ransacked by ruthless hosts in Europa League'

articles.description: Andre Onana was in the spotlight after another mistake in the Europa League - but is he a key player for Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim?
articles.title: Andre Onana: Is Man Utd keeper part of problem or solution for Ruben Amirom?

articles.description: Relive another unforgettable F1 season with our selection of the best pictures, including breakout wins, fresh faces on the grid, and a first constructors title for McLaren in 26 years.
articles.title: F1 2024 season in pictures: Best moments from Verstappen’s early dominance to McLaren’s constructors win

articles.description: The Los Angeles Rams beat the San Francisco 49ers 12-6 in a rain-affected game to boost their NFL play-off hopes.
articles.title: NFL: Los Angeles Rams beat San Francisco 49ers 12-6 in rain-hit game to boost play-off hopes

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou says Timo Werner's performance was "not acceptable" after replacing him at half-time in the 1-1 Europa League draw with Rangers.
articles.title: Timo Werner: Tottenham forward's performance 'not acceptable' - Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: Seamer Matthew Potts replaces Chris Woakes in the only change to the England XI for the third and final Test against New Zealand in Hamilton.
articles.title: New Zealand v England: Matthew Potts replaces Chris Woakes in Hamilton

articles.description: Li Tie, who also played for Everton in the English Premier League, was handed a 20-year sentence.
articles.title: China jails ex-football head coach Li Tie for bribery

articles.description: Manchester City announce a new Premier League record revenue of £715m in their latest accounts.
articles.title: Manchester City: Premier League club announces £715m record revenue

articles.description: Chelsea are in the middle of a busy December and with games every three or four days, which of their fringe players have been staking their claim for Premier League chances?
articles.title: 'He's been watching Suarez' - the Chelsea fringe players impressing
